thread.title: Svetlana
thread.title_full: The Official ECCO Shop recenserad av Svetlana

author: Svetlana
title: Svetlana
text: Everything went very well. The only weak point is that most of the product descriptions do not indicate clearly which season the shoes / boots are for. And that's important for winter boots as you can't see by the pictures if they're warm enough or not. Otherwise ECCO has got very nice and ergonomic footware, which is especially important for children
